recipe.title: Triple-Mustard Sauce
ingredients: 3 tablespoons chopped fresh tarragon or 2 teaspoons dried
1 1/2 tablespoons tarragon white wine vinegar or white wine vinegar
instructions: Stir first 4 ingredients in bowl until dry mustard dissolves. Mix in remaining ingredients. Let stand 15 minutes. (Can be made 3 days ahead. Cover and chill.)
